testcaseName: # 1 MMR at 12.5 mo; VZ not given=need 28 day interval for VZ
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from live virus vaccine
generalDescription: This test case describes when an MMR vaccine is administered at 12.5 months of age and Varicella wasn't, that a Varicella vaccine should be forecast 28 days later to provide proper live virus vaccine spacing.
reasonForChange: v4.3: moved the assessment date out one day to ensure live virus forecasting is engaged
